full_summary:
===============

**Tender Announcement**
------------------------

### Title and Reference

**Senior Staffing Consultant**
-------------------------------

Reference Number: `cb-7581-91116290`
Amendment Number: `1`
Solicitation Number: `24062-23-588`

### Timeline
------------

* Publication Date: `2023-07-26`
* Tender Closing Date: `2023-08-14 T14:00:00` (Expired)
* Expected Contract Start Date: `2023-09-01`
* Expected Contract End Date: `2026-08-31`

### Overview
------------

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a Senior Staffing Consultant to manage the recruitment process for Chief Financial Officer (CFO) positions at the EX-04 and EX-05 levels. The successful bidder will be responsible for creating pools of qualified candidates.

### Proposal Requirements
-------------------------

* Proposal submission must include a bid for all resource categories.
* The work is currently not being performed by a contracted resource.

### Procurement Details
------------------------

* Procurement Category: `SRV`
* Procurement Method: `Competitive - Selective tendering`
* Notice Type: `Request for Proposal`
* Trade Agreements: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and others.
* Regions of Opportunity: `National Capital Region (NCR)`
* Regions of Delivery: `National Capital Region (NCR)`

### Contracting Entity and Contact Information
-------------------------------------------

* Contracting Entity: Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat
* Contact Name: Dawn Dormer
* Contact Email: Dawn.Dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (343) 542-8102
* Contact Address: 90 Elgin Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R5, Canada

### Attachments
-------------

The tender notice and proposal instructions are available at the following links:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7581/24062-23-588-npp-tsps-eng.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7581/24062-23-588-npp-tsps-fr_0.pdf
